QuestData.Title: It's Time to Oil Up
QuestData.Description: Three things come out of Irontree Clearing: lumber, oil, and exhausted workers. The first two are pretty much the cause of the third, but I like to be efficient about things where I can.$B$BI've got our shredders working triple unpaid overtime, and there's really nowhere in the schedule for them to get maintenance.$B$BUse this grappling hook to nab some of the extra oil cans floating around camp and use them to oil up the shredders, would you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Darla's Grapple to collect Irontree Oil Cans and use them to oil 7 Irontree Shredders.
QuestData.CompletionText: So why are you sticking around here wasting my time?
QuestData.RewardText: Efficiency in the workforce! Wonderful.$B$BMaybe I should check on the goblins inside those shredders later.
